tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ServerConfiguration (
    server_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_name VARCHAR(255),
    server_ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    server_os VARCHAR(50),
    server_memory_gb INT,
    server_storage_gb INT
);

CREATE TABLE servers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  server_name VARCHAR(255),
  ip_address VARCHAR(15),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  os_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE networking_devices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  model VARCHAR(100),
  firmware_version VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE server_config (
  server_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  server_name TEXT,
  server_ip TEXT,
  server_location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE network_device (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name TEXT,
  device_type TEXT,
  device_ip TEXT,
  device_location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE config_history (
  history_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  config_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE NetworkingDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    ip_address VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE server_config (
    server_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_name VARCHAR(50),
    server_ip VARCHAR(15),
    os_version VARCHAR(20),
    memory_gb INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_device_config (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(20),
    device_ip VARCHAR(15),
    device_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE firewall_config (
    firewall_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    firewall_name VARCHAR(50),
    firewall_ip VARCHAR(15),
    firewall_status BOOLEAN,
    priority_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE switch_config (
    switch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    switch_name VARCHAR(50),
    switch_ip VARCHAR(15),
    switch_model VARCHAR(20),
    ports_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE router_config (
    router_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    router_name VARCHAR(50),
    router_ip VARCHAR(15),
    router_model VARCHAR(20),
    throughput_mbps INT
);
